location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from David Seton, Resident, Muscat, to Nawab Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun, Native Resident, Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter, received 6 July 1802, David Seton, Resident at Muscat, informs Nawab Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun [Mirza Mahdi 'Ali Khan Bahadur], Native Resident at Bushire, that he (Seton) is going to Bombay, having been recommended a change of climate for the recovery of his health. In his absence, the Broker will conduct the Company's business at Muscat.
